name: Magical Princesses: Forest Journey. Save the Day!!
name_original: Magical Princesses: Forest Journey. Save the Day!!
description:
Violetta and Passione have to fight a hell of enemies in order to protect the forest. Dodge skillfully in battle and clear the forest!

Controls: Up/Down/Right/Left

Attack: Y/Z 

Switch: X

Special: C

A Game Made by Magic Lasers:

Game design, Art, Animations : Wynn Art, thedonotknow

Story: quicheunleashed

Programing : Otwald, devilapple

Music : Xagu
